New Records: Quinton de Kock scored 74, his highest T20 World Cup score; Andries Gous scored 80, his career-best
Key Match Events: Kagiso Rabada took two key wickets in the Powerplay; Heinrich Klaasen and Tristan Stubbs shared a fifth-wicket partnership of 53; Rabada contributed to stopping USA's late charge
Post-Match Reflections: De Kock's performance was a key moment; Rabada's contributions were crucial; the win was crucial for South Africa's campaign
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was part of the T20 World Cup 2024; USA gave a strong account in their first Super Eight match; the batting-friendly pitch and fielding highlights like Ali Khan's catch and Aiden Markram's stunner
Others: The match was the 41st in the Super Eights group
